Is it not your duty to take up the case of the man who says that Brother Palmer has wronged him, and see that justice is done him? Brother Palmer has excellent abilities. When he is sanctified, body, soul, and spirit, God can use him. But when he loses his hold on God, his natural tendencies to wrong take control, and he deals unjustly.--Letter 15, 1904. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. August 6, 1987. Entire Letter.
